<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvsubtarget/#a88dc8b839aabb06854d711317cbbdac8"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvsubtarget/#a88dc8b839aabb06854d711317cbbdac8">RISCVSubtarget::getMaxBuildIntsCost</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loading integer from constant pool needs two instructions (the reason why</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the minimum cost is 2): an address calculation instruction and a load</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction. Usually, address calculation and instructions used for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// building integers (addi, slli, etc.) can be done in one cycle, so here we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// set the default cost to (LoadLatency + 1) if no threshold is provided.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#af4f3c9694d208796cfcf6bcee4415704">RISCVMaxBuildIntsCost</a> == 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">             ? getSchedModel().LoadLatency + 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">             : std::max&lt;unsigned&gt;(2, <a href="#af4f3c9694d208796cfcf6bcee4415704">RISCVMaxBuildIntsCost</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do bidirectional scheduling since it provides a more balanced scheduling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// leading to better performance. This will increase compile time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Policy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machineschedpolicy/#a0f609dd4ed94ea69ab680a7228f8786b">OnlyTopDown</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Spilling is generally expensive on all RISC-V cores, so always enable</span></CodeLine>
